text: geudeul ihue on jadeul-eun ju yeo jeohuiwa jeohui ijeon-e mid-eum-eul gajyeossdeon jadeul-ege gwan-yong-eul bepul-eo ju soseo jeohuiui ma-eumsog-e midneun salam deulde daehan jeung-oham-i nam-a issji anhdolog hayeo jusoseo juyeo sillo dangsin-eun chinjeolgwa jabilo chungmanhasibnidalago malhadeola
